subdialogue_text: I believe...I feel the scent of ash upon thee.
Thou'rt the one of whom uncle Gael spoke.
The one to show me flame.
Tis good. When this is done, may I return.
The door is open thanks to thee.
Tis good. I'll head off to paint.
I promised uncle Gael I would.
Thou'rt Ash.
Thou'st a pact made with uncle Gael.
So I wish to tell thee all.
Behold its size. This is my canvas.
It's to be a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
...But first, I must see flame.
I wish to paint a picture.
Of a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
One day, it will make someone a goodly home.
That's why I must see flame.

behavior: #0After approaching her at her 2nd location, after leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Those who aren't ken to fire cannot paint a world.

behavior: #0After approaching her at her 2nd location, after leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Those absorbed by fire, must not paint a world.

behavior: #0After approaching her at her 2nd location, after leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Don't worry, I haven't forgotten, Mother...
I can hear the fire crackle...
And soon, I will see it...
My thanks, Ashen One.
I will finish the painting.
Of a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
So that it might make a home for someone, someday.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Blackflame Friede, then leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: My thanks, Ashen One.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Blackflame Friede, then leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: I can almost see the flame.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Blackflame Friede, then leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Soon uncle Gael will bring me the pigment.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Blackflame Friede, then leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: I wonder if he has found it?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Blackflame Friede, then leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: The dark soul of man...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Slave Knight Geal at Fillanore's Rest

behavior: #0Choose "Yes" to give the Blood of the Dark Soul
subdialogue_text: Please tell me thy name.

behavior: #0Choose "Yes" to give the Blood of the Dark Soul
subdialogue_text: I would name this painting after thee.
I see. We are much alike.
Twill be a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
And one day, it will make someone a goodly home.
Then I will name this painting "Ash".
My thanks. I will paint a world of that name.
Twill be a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
And one day, it will make someone a goodly home.
